stance_1: Doctors recommend I eat lean beef
stance_2: I am chronically anemic
justification: It is directly stated that doctors recommend lean beef because of chronic anemia.

stance_2: I avoid processed meats

justification: Some social contacts avoid meat for animal welfare, contrasting with the interviewee's regular consumption.

stance_1: I eat meat regularly

stance_1: I eat meat regularly

justification: Interviewee dismisses climate arguments for reducing meat; fear of government control supports continuing meat consumption.
